proposals.title: Predict Food Grain Production Trends Using Area and Yield Data
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast annual food grain production across India using area and yield estimates from 2015-2024. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness with 2022-2024 data fully populated. Focus on INR-based metrics where applicable.

join_plan.notes: Both datasets share [Crop, Season] composite key. Area metrics align across files for temporal analysis.

transform_ideas: Calculate 3-year rolling averages for area and yield
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Use median imputation for 2020-21/2021-22 gaps with forward-fill validation

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2015-2022) and 20% testing (2023-2024). Validate against actual 2023-24 production values.
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% completeness in all feature columns
Check for season-specific crop production seasonality patterns

excluded_columns.reason: High null fraction (62.5%) in export dataset

proposals.title: Forecast Rice Export Value to Bangladesh Using Historical Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Predict quarterly rice export values (INR) to Bangladesh using historical 2018-2021 data with verified ≥65% completeness. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness for 2018-2021 period.

join_plan.notes: Single dataset analysis using HS Code/Description composite key

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop 2023-24 records due to 62.5% nulls, impute small gaps using forward fill

proposals.validation_plan: Time series split: Train on 2018-2021 (complete data), validate on 2022-23, test on 2024-25
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% non-null in all feature columns
Check for monotonic value trends across years

proposals.title: Forecast Seasonal Yield Variability for Major Food Grains in India
proposals.problem_statement: This task aims to predict seasonal yield variability for major food grains in India using historical yield data across seasons. Yield is a critical indicator of agricultural productivity and is influenced by factors like weather, soil, and farming practices. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

join_plan.notes: The dataset contains a composite key of [Crop, Season] which can be used to uniquely identify yield records for each crop-season combination.

transform_ideas: Normalize yield values by crop type
Create lag features for previous seasons
Encode season as a categorical variable
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values using forward-fill or mean imputation based on crop type.

proposals.validation_plan: Use time-based cross-validation to evaluate model performance, splitting data by year to avoid data leakage. Validate using RMSE and R² metrics.
quality_checks: Ensure all yield values are positive
Check for data consistency across seasons
Validate that imputed values align with historical trends

excluded_columns.reason: Not directly relevant to yield prediction
